entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
